text: Rogaciano Alba Alvarez (Rogaciano Alba) is the current head of Guerrero's cattle ranching union (Guerrero cattlemen's association). He was mayor of Petatlan and is a rancher. In 2002 he was investigated for involvement in the murder of Digna Ochoa, a human rights lawyer, Zapatista supporter and anti- logging activist.Death toll rises to 17 in attacks on cattle ranchers in southern Mexico He was also accused of involvement in the murder of Merejildo Torres.http://mypage.direct.ca/c/carlos/ar27s02i.html as retrieved on 29 April 2008 03:40:03 GMT. On May 4, 2008 his home was attacked by forty gunmen. His two sons, Alejandro and Rusbel, were killed, his daughter kidnapped and at least seven other people killed.BBC NEWS | Americas | Ranchers killed in Mexico attack ==References== Category:Law enforcement in Mexico Category:Mayors of places in Mexico Category:Living people Category:Ranchers Category:Mexican farmers Category:People from Guerrero Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
